modName: A template can separate animations for different gender
summary: A simple template can separate animations for different gender.The female animations and idles which can be replaced will not affect male and NPC of male in this template.
descriptionHtml:
A simple template can separate animations for different gender.The female animations and idles which can be replaced will not affect male and NPC of male in this template.

Methods:
1. Download this MOD, unzip to any directory.
2. Find your own favorite animations or idles and download.
3. If you want to replace female animations or idles, overwrite the files in the directory \\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\female of my template. (Crossbow files are in the directory \\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\dlc01\\female\\.).
4. If you want to replace the original or male animations, directly copy the download files into the directory \\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\ of my template.(Crossbow files are in the folder \\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\dlc01.).
5. Packing the template, then use the NMM or other MOD management software to load.

Appendix: The hkx list for female which can be replaced will not affect male and NPC of male.
